text: Rutger Gunnarsson (12 February 1946 - 8 May 2015) was a Swedish musician, bass guitarist, arranger and record producer. He was best known as a bassist for ABBA on tours and their albums, serving as a Kapellmeister. He also worked with artists including Celine Dion, Westlife, Elton John, Adam Ant, Bobbysocks, Gwen Stefani, Elin Lanto, Joyride and Alla Pugacheva. Gunnarsson was born in Linköping Municipality, Östergötland County. He died in Stockholm, aged 69. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Bass guitarists Category:Pop musicians Category:Swedish musicians Category:Swedish record producers
title: Rutger Gunnarsson
